name: SFSubscriberTypesWithUpsertActivity
description: This app having two flows one with SFUpsert and other with SF Trigger

handlers.description: In this flow records are getting fetched from mysql database using query and using Salesforce Upsert records from database are getting created in the salesforce if not exist already and updated if already exist.
handlers.name: SFUpsertWithMySQLDB

handlers.description: In this flow Salesforce trigger is used with Subscriber type as Change Data Capture and this trigger will executes when there are changes to Salesforce records in the Contact object i,e here once the flow 'SFUpsertWithMySQLDB' executes.
handlers.name: SFChangeDataCapture

data.name: SFUpsertWithMySQLDB
data.description: In this flow records are getting fetched from mysql database using query and using Salesforce Upsert records from database are getting created in the salesforce if not exist already and updated if already exist.

tasks.name: MySQLQuery
tasks.description: This activity executes query on a MySQL database

input.Query: select * from customers where customerName like 'To%';

input.query: SELECT Id, Name, ContactID__c FROM Contact where LastName like 'UpdatedLastNameFromUpsert'

data.name: SFChangeDataCapture
data.description: In this flow Salesforce trigger is used with Subscriber type as Change Data Capture and this trigger will executes when there are changes to Salesforce records in the Contact object i,e here once the flow 'SFUpsertWithMySQLDB' executes.
